resources.string: This setting will enable the fake power off service. Accessibility permission is required to use this service.

After the fake power off is completed, the device will be blocked by an empty black screen. Dismiss the screen using custom sequential volume button presses. The sequence must only include \'U\' for volume up and \'D\' for volume down.
If enabled, this setting will put the device into DND mode during the fake power off sequence. Please customize the DND mode from the android settings.
If enabled, this setting will lock the device (lockscreen) during the fake shutdown sequence.

Usage instructions: 
1. Enable Fake Power Off in the settings menu. 
2. Configure rest of the settings as needed. 
3. Hold power button for ~5s for original power menu. 
4. FPO will dismiss the original power menu with a fake menu. 
5. Pressing any of the buttons will trigger the fake shutdown. 
6. Recover from the black overlay using the set volume buttons.

The Fake Power Off app simulates device shutdown with a minimal animation. Perfect for deterring unauthorized access, the app provides a convincing visual effect without actually powering off the device. Ideal for use with anti-theft apps and remains effective even when the device is locked.

This app requires the Accessibility Service permission to provide its core functionality. Specifically, this permission allows the app to:

1. Detect when the power menu is opened.
2. Replace the default power menu with a custom fake power menu.
3. Simulating a device shutdown by using an overlay.
4. Detect volume button press sequence to recover from the overlay.

The Accessibility Service permission is crucial for the app to function correctly and provide the intended user experience. This app does not change any settings without your permission, bypass Android's built-in privacy controls, or engage in any deceptive practices.

Additionally, the app requests the Do Not Disturb (DND) permission to optionally put the device in the DND mode during the fake power off simulation. This permission is optional and can be granted if you wish to use this feature.

By continuing, you acknowledge the necessity of these permissions for the app's functionality. Do you wish to proceed?
